message.body: Hi Ing, can u come today to talk a bit about next week?
(The days you would like are the 19th and 20th, yes? It's what I have in my calendar)
Do u want/can sleep here more days? Say get here for sleeping basically? You could come around 9 or any time before then of course.
If you'd like, I can absolutely do that. Anything you'd like!
K cool. It would be mainly to keep company to Nicoll at night and help me w Mona!!!
Think of how much would u want and let's try to meet Monday then.
Awwww so cute!!! Monday sounds great. What time is good for you? (Or do you want to just text me on Monday?)
I am more less flexible. How is 5:30? We could grab a coffee while Lucas is in his group therapy.
There is a cafe on spruce and 16 (or is it 15?) do u know which one I am talking about?
Nope but I'll find it! Is it where we met to go over the modernism syllabus that one time?!
No, is on a corner. And it has large windows. 15 or 16.
